description: My apartment are near Times Square, Radio City Music Hall, 5 Napkin Burger, Pio Pio, 44 & Hell's Kitchen. It is a brand new luxury apartment in Times Square area and Theater zone. You can walk,  take cross town bus and get on the subway at almost every corner a few block away. My apartment is good for a couple, a couple with a teenager, or someone on business trip.
name: Modern one bed room Apt in Times Square area, NYC
